title: Algorithms
description: Software University course about sorting, searching, combinatorial, greedy and graph algorithms and techniques like recursion and dynamic programming.

title: Data Structures
description: Course in Software University covering material like linear, tree and associative arrays data structures as well as calculating algorithm complexity for different operations.

title: Front-End
description: Software University module about front-end development with two courses: HTML & CSS and CSS Advanced. Ends with a project defense on 15.12.2019

title: Food As A Service
description: Web application project created for Technical University of Sofia bachelor's degree defense. Technologies used include Java, Spring, PostgreSQL, Git & GitHub, Heroku cloud hosting, HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Project was defended in 26.09.2019

title: JS Core
description: JavaScript module from Software University containing three courses: JS Essentials, JS Advanced and JS Apps. Ended in 05.08.2019

title: Mobile Apps with Java
description: Course in Technical University of Sofia. Ended with a project defense on 15.05.2019.

title: Softuniada 2019
description: Participated in software olympiad, hosted by Software University, where algorithmic tasks were given and had to be solved in a fixed time. Scored 511/1000 points, placing in 7th place.

title: BEST Engineering Week
description: Participated in a contest, organised by 'BEST Sofia' where as part of a small team of university colleagues, we developed a small web application for validating personal identification numbers and IBANs. Contest lasted 5 hours and was held at 'UniCredit Bulbank'.

title: Data Mining
description: Course in Technical University of Sofia. Ended with team console project defense on 06.06.2019. Used language was Python and the problem the project solved was lowering the risk of customers not returning loans by adjusting loan terms like loan amount and payback period.

title: Java Web
description: From Software University, studied material covers web development in two courses: Java Web Development Basics and Java MVC Frameworks - Spring. Module ended in 15.04.2019

title: C++ Programming
description: Course about the fundamentals of programming with C++. Course ended with a project about custom ArrayList implementation, which was defended on 26.02.2019.

title: Computer Graphics with C++
description: Technical University of Sofia course in which the basics of generating images were taught. Main library used was OpenGL. Course ended with a project defense on 26.02.2019.

title: Java DB
description: Software University database module with two courses: MySQL and Spring Data. Final exam was on 10.12.2018

title: Java Fundamentals
description: Vital module from Software University. Divided into three courses: Java Advanced, Java OOP Basics and Java OOP Advanced. The last course ended with an exam on 13.08.2018

title: Softuniada 2018
description: Participated in software olympiad, organised by Software University, where algorithmic tasks were given and had to be solved in a fixed time and got 300/1000 points, placing in 165th place.

title: Java Programming
description: Technical University of Sofia course about fundamentals of Java programming, ending with project defense of a simple GUI application on 29.06.2018

title: Tech Module
description: Module from Software University. Divided into two courses: Programming Fundamentals and Software Technologies. Ended in 22.04.2018

title: Programming Basics with Java
description: First course in Software University. An intro to programming. Exam was on 17.12.2017
